name: cypress-ebac-shop
description: Automação E2E com Cypress - EBAC Shop

scripts.cy:run:chrome: cypress run --browser chrome && npm run cy:report
scripts.cy:report: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/mochawesome/*.json -o cypress/reports/mochawesome/report.json && npx marge cypress/reports/mochawesome/report.json -f report -o cypress/reports/html --reportTitle "Relatório de Testes E2E - EBAC Shop" --reportPageTitle "EBAC Shop Test Report" && npm run copy:videos
scripts.copy:videos: xcopy /E /I /Y cypress\videos cypress\reports\html\videos 2>nul || cp -r cypress/videos cypress/reports/html/ 2>/dev/null || echo Videos copiados
